text: I ran 4 kilometers at the park.
I planted to build a garden in my house.
I went bouldering at a gym with a good friend.
I was invited to a party
It was a nive workout in the gym.
I learned that my friend was finally getting a liver transplant after 14 years.
I tried real filette for the first time
feeling the warmth of the sun as i walked outside with my cat
